title: Eardrum Image Classification
description: Designed a deep learning system to classify eardrum images into normal, effusion, and tube cases. Compared CNN, ResNet-18, and AlexNet architectures on a dataset of 454 labeled images, achieving high accuracy and F1 scores for automated, objective diagnosis of middle ear conditions.

title: Stock Market Forecasting
description: Developed complex time-series forecasting models using LSTM and Random Forest algorithms for predicting stock market trends. Integrated real-time data feeds using the Yahoo Finance API into a Streamlit dashboard for interactive data visualization.

title: Purchase Behavior Analysis
description: Leveraged machine learning to forecast retail sales and optimize business decisions. Merged and cleaned multi-source data, engineered features, and evaluated models including Random Forest and Extra Trees. Achieved best results with Random Forest, providing actionable insights for inventory, promotions, and operational efficiency.

title: Kidney Disease Prediction Model
description: Built a robust machine learning tool for early detection and risk assessment of kidney disease using clinical data from Kaggle. Implemented and compared KNN, Decision Tree, Random Forest, AdaBoost, Gradient Boosting, Na√Øve Bayes, and Logistic Regression, achieving up to 99% accuracy with Gradient Boosting. Enabled proactive healthcare interventions through precise risk prediction.
